page.title: 03Education - Hassall Green
page.content: {A VISIT TO HASSALL GREEN SCHOOL The school was very small. We saw the infants first and then the juniors. There were only 3 girls in the 4th year. The 4th year girls showed us the play ground. To get to it from the yard you have to go through a little passage. They had a field as well. It was only a small field but on it they played football and cricket. They had a sand pit and also a climbing frame. We went back inside and did some maths in the hall. At 10:40 it was playtime. At 11.00 we did english. We had to write a story. When it was 12:00 a bell didn't ring a teacher said "dinnertime!" In the afternoon we did craft and then went for a short walk by the canal. One of the boy's mums led us along. There were only 35 children in the school, but it is a very friendly school.
